titles.title: Health Care Benefits Financial Protection Act of 1998

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow employers who maintain a self-insured health plan for their employees a credit against income tax for a portion of the cost paid for providing health coverage for their employees.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 8/5/1998--Introduced. Health Care Benefits Financial Protection Act of 1998 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to establish a limited credit for an eligible employer for costs incurred in maintaining an employee group health plan.
